name: Merseyrail Daysaver (1 day rail only)
description:
MERSEYRAIL DAY SAVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day across the Merseyrail network extending as far as Southport, Ormskirk, Kirkby, Hunts Cross, 
      Ellesmere Port, Chester, West Kirby and New Brighton. Prices stated are for the "all zones" ticket, cheaper fares are available for fewer zones, see the website for details.

LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London Kings Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them. A number of PTE areas sell local rangers from TVMs in their area e.g. South Yorkshire, Strathclyde and West Midlands * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities
